reviews.text:
Mall has been around for a while. A good neighbourhood mall with F&B choices. Popular because it is in proximity to Mt E hospital and Tan Tock Seng. Come here for basic amenity. It is marketed as a sports centric offering mall but the offering has reduced from its heyday.

Conveniently connected to Novena MRT.

This mall has been around for a long time and is still thriving after all these years! Love that it is conveniently located right above Novena MRT on the North South Line. Walking distance from other malls too with shelter nearby. Lots of eateries here as well as sports shops. Will be back!

Velocity @ Novena Square is a modern shopping mall which is located at the vibrant Novena neighborhood. It offers various stores from sports, lifestyle, fashion,  beauty & wellness, fitness centre, electronics, home & furnishing, supermarket  as well as dining options from snacks, fast food, till restaurants. It is also connected to Square 2 mall and Novena station of MRT North South Line. It is a good place if you are looking for food and shops.
Overall good mall with plenty of restaurant choose from. Was here after many years today came for oppo service center.

The biggest D.LAB Doraemon event of the year from 13th Nov to 8 Dec 2024 at Novena Square Level 1 Atrium just opposite Toastbox.

Come join us to see the latest Doraemon and D.LAB Products! Enjoy exclusive discounts.
